name: Rolling Home (jolsensei)
description:
Even beetles have some adventures!

Accompany our little buddy in this minimalistic puzzle game about finding your way back to home with your dung ball safe and sound with the correct size!

Each roll the ball takes will increase the "next size" gauge by one! Reach 10 and your ball will become bigger

You can see here some special tiles that will make your adventure a little bit funnier, but also more complex :

 - Increases your roll counter by 10

- Decreases your roll counter by 10

- If your ball is the small one, you'll lost it

- You and the ball will slide till the next safe tile

Controls :

WASD - Move, navigate the menu

R - Restart level

Enter - Select menu options

Esc - Return to main manu, back

F11 - Enter/Exit fullscreen

Game made by :

Jhais - Original idea, intro cutscene,  ingame animator, level designer

jolsensei (Me) - Programming, ingame pixel art
